p.3: Our client is a well funded startup company that develops cutting edge image guided solutions for precision surgery.

li: System and architecture design of advanced visualization system for medical imaging/surgical intervention;
li.1: UI design and system integration of medical software applications;
li.2: Implementation, and verification of functions, operations, and visualizations of 3D representations of volumes/objects;
li.3: Conforming to the Company=E2=80=99s standard/procedure of product development;
li.4: Efficiently communicating with project managers and team members on the execution;
li.5: Other job responsibilities as assigned by the management.

strong: Candidates shall meet part of the below qualifications

li: Software skill in using C/C++, Qt programming and design,.NET programming and form design;
li.1: Knowledge 2D/3D computer graphics and visualization experience;
li.2: Knowledge in mesh model manipulation, geometric math concepts, computer-aided design a plus;
li.3: Skill in using C/C++, OpenGL, and/or GPU programming;
